verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: 'm] [ARG2: a financial planner] and i repeatedly watch smart people make the same investing mistake as a financial advisor eric roberge encounters people who want to hold off on investing their cash until they think it the right time based on the market but he says this strategy is ill - advised the more successful investing strategy is to focus on time in the market founder writer ben carlson advisor eric roberge bob
